title: Vine Marijuana Dispensary in Kalamazoo MI - Exclusive
text: HAVE ANY QUESTIONS? SEND US A MESSAGE VINE MICHIGAN CANNABIS Have you ever thought, “Is there a choice dispensary near me?” When you live in the Vine area of Kalamazoo, you probably don’t think about driving to another city just to get your bud. Fortunately, whether you’re a medical or recreational patient, Exclusive is just a twelve-minute drive up the road! To visit our Vine dispensary, simply turn right onto Oakland Dr to W Michigan Ave for about 2 minutes (0.8 miles). You’ll turn another right onto W Michigan Ave headed to Comstock Township. Stay in the right lane to turn right onto E Michigan Ave, then turn another right onto S Sprinkle Rd. After less than half a mile, you’ll turn right onto Lake St and get in the left lane to turn left onto Foster Ave. Once you’ve reached Foster Ave, we’ll be the Vine marijuana dispensary on the left! We might not be the closest Vine cannabis dispensary, but we make the short drive worth your while with premium product selection and memorable experiences. What’s different about Exclusive compared to every other Vine cannabis store? We put in work to show off how we stand out! First of all, we’re the state’s first recreationally licensed brand. As such, we’re able to offer exclusive products and deals that you won’t find elsewhere. We produce Magic Edibles, Terpene Tanks, Concentrate Kings, and Strain Kings. Plus, we manufacture Church Cannabis Co., Kushy Punch, and Platinum Vape. When you visit our Vine dispensary, it’s easy to find specialty products that aren’t available just anywhere! Every week, we offer a variety of new, different deals on an array of products, both for recreational and medical cannabis users. Our weekly deals page stays chock full of limited-time deals that you don’t want to miss out on. On top of that, save even more with a first-time customer, student, or veteran discount. Can’t make it in person to our Vine cannabis store just yet? You can browse through our online menu and conveniently place an order for later pickup. When you order online, we get your products ready and all packed up so your designated pickup time is swift and easy. And while you’re at it, you’ll rack up some points for your next visit. Whether you place an order online or purchase in person, you become more than just an Exclusive customer. You’ll be an Exclusive VIP! With that title, you can earn VIP Rewards points with every purchase. Every dollar spent equals more points earned for your next Vine dispensary trip. So, not only do we have quality products, exclusive deals, weekly deals, and discounts, but we also offer Exclusive VIP rewards points. Save more every time you shop with a system we’ve built around our customers—not the other way around! Have questions before you buy? Our staff is ready and happy to help! Meet our knowledgeable, friendly team of cannabis experts who can answer any questions, address any concerns, and provide you with a recommendation or two tailored just to you. Drop by our Vine dispensary in person or place an order online today to see why Exclusive is the number one cannabis dispensary in Michigan. JOIN OUR VIP MAILING LIST Get access to exclusive rewards, discounts, promotions and more exclusive news! This will clear your cart and selections. Are you sure you want to proceed ? Select a retailer store from either recreational or medicine Some retailers will only support one order type. Shopping Cart Before You Go
